help.title: Help Center
help.safetyDesc: Things to keep in mind while trading online
tips: Never share your OTP or password with anyone.
Accept delivery only after checking quality.
Always pay through the app for safety.
Report immediately if any suspicious farmer or buyer is found.
help.response: Answer will be received in 24 hours
help.ans1: Yes, registration is absolutely free for both farmers and buyers. We do not take any joining fee.
help.ans2: Buyers pay online into Khedut Setu's secure Escrow account. Once the farmer delivers the goods and the buyer confirms the quality, the money is immediately transferred to the farmer's bank account.
help.faq3: What if I receive poor quality goods?
help.ans3: You can reject the goods at the time of delivery. If you have already accepted it, you can complain within 24 hours. Our team will investigate and if found appropriate, will provide a refund.

about.title: About Khedut Setu
about.subtitle: Convergence of Technology and Tradition
about.storyDesc: For years, Indian farmers have faced low returns due to middlemen and market uncertainty. The aim of 'Khedut Setu' is to change this system. We have created a digital platform where the farmer is king and the customer gets purity.
about.missionDesc: To double farmers' income and bring transparency to agriculture. Connecting every farmer with the world through smartphone.
about.visionDesc: An India where farmers are self-reliant and farming becomes a profitable business.

legal.introDesc: Welcome to Khedut Setu. By using this platform you agree to our terms. Our aim is to facilitate transparent trade between farmers and buyers.
farmerTerms: Providing true and accurate information of your crop is mandatory.
Posting wrong photos or price will be considered a violation of rules.
The responsibility of timely delivery after receiving the order will be of the farmer.
buyerTerms: Payment should be done securely through the app only while ordering.
Check the quality of goods at the time of delivery.
Inform within 24 hours for any dispute.
legal.collectionDesc: We take your name, mobile number, and address only for order processing and delivery.
legal.usageDesc: Your data is secure. We do not sell your data to any third party. It is used only to find farmers or customers near you.
legal.paymentSecurityDesc: All your online transactions are encrypted and secure. We do not save your bank details.
legal.securityAssuranceDesc: Khedut Setu complies with IT rules of Government of India and is committed to user security.
